content.rendered:
At Herbs of Africa, we pride ourselves on developing and manufacturing premium quality herbal medicines and supplements. Since we opened for business, our focus has always been on providing exceptionally high-quality efficacious products based on African traditional medicine backed by science.

When sourcing our raw materials and products’ inputs, we pay close attention to the growing and manufacture process, as well as taking into consideration environmental issues and the farming practices used.

Our strong customer base and excellent reviews are testament to the time and effort we put in to ensuring only the best quality products reach our shelves.

All of our products are tested to meet stringent safety standards using multiple methods. We adhere to Good Manufacture Practices (GMP) and all products are thoroughly analysed and tested by the National Agency for Food and Drug Administration (NAFDAC).

Quality Assurance

Our Quality Assurance Scheme looks at a number of issues before we releasing a new product into our marketing line and offering. These include:

  • Certification of Analysis
  • Safety testing and checks
  • Farming practices
  • Manufacture integrity – to ensure the delicate nutrients and enzymes are preserved
  • Eco-friendly Packaging
  • Optimal Storage condition to ensure optimum freshness
  • NAFDAC evaluation and certification for safety

Organic Certification

We have adopted the standards set out by The Organic Food Federation GB-ORG-04 which are themselves based largely on the EU Council Regulation 834/2007.
We source our raw material through ethical sources aside from our own farming system which account for the bulk of the ingredients used in our products; In line with our rigorous practice to ensure compliance, we can assure

  • 100% of ingredients supplied to Herbs of Africa are certified as organic
  • They have so far met all the criteria set for basic quality assurance.

We work hard to constantly improve and maintain our Quality Policing effort. Related standard operating procedures (SOP) are revised and updated on a regular basis.
